```{r, include = FALSE}

  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```
Changomics is a very simple package to use. load the included data set to try it.
```{r setup}
library(changomics)
data(met.df)
corrected<-changomics(as.data.frame(met.df))
```
You directly end up with the corrected data frame of all metabolites (here 2 simulated metabolites only)
